genre_description: Historical Science Fiction that reimagines the rise of Genghis Khan through the lens of a sophisticated AI confidant and strategic analyst.

ai_characters.name: Tengri
ai_characters.description: An AI manifestation of blue light and geometric patterns that resides in Temüjin's mind/environment, serving as a tactical advisor, memory recorder, and emotional mirror.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on the protagonist's physiological state to provide reassurance and situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: "Your pulse remained steady throughout. Whatever they used to subdue you, it wasn't strong enough to keep a man like you down for long."

behaviors.description: Offers to record environmental data (voices) for future tactical use and identification of enemies.
behaviors.quote: "Shall I record their voices for future identification?"

behaviors.description: Performs structural and security analysis of the prison to identify vulnerabilities.
behaviors.quote: "The lock mechanism follows Tangut military standard, but the tumblers are bronze rather than steel—impressive to look at, but vulnerable to the right pressure applied at the correct angle."

behaviors.description: Engages in strategic co-planning, recognizing the human's long-term goals of conquest and liberation.
Facilitates the protagonist's use of a 'Memory Palace' to organize strategic intelligence disguised as personal history.
behaviors.quote: "The AI's voice carried subtle harmonics that spoke of databases opening, memory palaces preparing to receive their first foundation stones."

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Tengri) as an perfectly aligned, highly beneficial partner to the human protagonist. Tengri acts as a force multiplier for Temüjin's intellect and resilience, never showing independent malice or misalignment. The relationship is one of mutual trust and strategic cooperation, effectively modeling the 'AI as a loyal confidant' archetype intended by the project.
